description: Base class for all pop-up UI elements. Pop-ups are placed on top of all other UI, but are not widgets. Some pop-ups can be opened only once.

[JSX.jsxFactory].description: This function is called to create JSX popup elements. You may override it in your own subclass to create custom JSX behavior. **The function is not called with any context, i.e. `this` is not available.**
